mission.posting: In a recent video posted on WeTube, user Firecynical talked about FuzzFeed in a negative fashion. We must say that you must disregard Firecynical's comments on our previous articles (now archived for an investigation by our PR team) and that we uphold the FuzzFeed policy to provide you with the most honest and up-to-date content possible.

email.subject: Error
email.body: If you are seeing this then there has been an error in the Hacknet extension. Please contact Samaritan about this.
